parameters.query:
INSERT INTO rides (
  athlete_id,
  ride_date,
  distance_km,
  duration_min,
  avg_power_watts,
  avg_heart_rate,
  tss,
  source,
  created_at
)
VALUES (
  {{$node["Find or Create Athlete"].json["id"]}},
  ('{{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["ride_date"]}}')::timestamptz AT TIME ZONE 'UTC',
  {{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["distance_km"]}},
  {{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["duration_min"]}},
  {{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["avg_power_watts"]}},
  {{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["avg_heart_rate"]}},
  {{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["tss"]}},
  'webhook',
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (athlete_id, ride_date) DO UPDATE
SET distance_km     = EXCLUDED.distance_km,
    duration_min    = EXCLUDED.duration_min,
    avg_power_watts = EXCLUDED.avg_power_watts,
    avg_heart_rate  = EXCLUDED.avg_heart_rate,
    tss             = EXCLUDED.tss
RETURNING id;

INSERT INTO ai_feedback (ride_id, advice, created_at)
VALUES (
  {{$node["Insert Ride"].json["id"]}},
  '{{$node["Format AI Response"].json["advice"]}}',
  NOW()
)
RETURNING id;
